name: Ambient Array
description: Large array of Ambient Panels that produce enough energy during the day to power a Size 5 item.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Ambient Charger
description: A portable ambient Panel with short-range (R=0, contact) power transmission. Capable of powering and charging the equivalent of one Size 4 device, carried on one's person.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Ambient Panel (Solar)
description: The panel absorbs solar energy and converts it to electricity. Capable of powering and charging the equivalent of one Size 4 device, carried on one's person.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Ambient Panel (Thermal)
description: The panel absorbs thermal energy and converts it to electricity. Capable of powering and charging the equivalent of one Size 4 device, carried on one's person.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Ambient Panel (Starlight)
description: The panel absorbs stellar energy and converts it to electricity. Capable of powering and charging the equivalent of one Size 4 device, carried on one's person.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Antimatter Battery
description:
<!-- Summary Start -->The antimatter battery is a small box finished in grey metal, with two gold colored contacts on its upper surface. It operates by a controlled flow of antimatter against an ordinary matter core. Flow is metered in response to demand, and very high levels of current are available.<!-- Summary End --> Its two contacts will provide the output of an ACS Power Plant-1 for up to 10 years.

Antimatter batteries are quite resistant to damage, but are not impervious. They have an Armor Value equal to their TL (for a standard antimatter battery, this is AV 25). Penetrating armor will fracture battery casing and release energy.

Antimatter batteries are constructed to bleed energy slowly if broken or cracked. In such a case, the battery will flash brightly for up to one space combat turn (20 minutes) with very bright light and intense heat. Anyone at close range (5m) is subject to Burn-1 per combat round, and Burn-3 at Contact range.

Antimatter batteries may be linked together to gener- ate correspondingly greater power: nine batteries chained together provides the output of an ACS Power Plant-9.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: FusionPlus
description: <!-- Summary Start -->17 liter sealed energy unit, with a 1-year internal fuel supply.<!-- Summary End --> Powers a Size 6 item for one year, or up to 3 Size 5 items for one year, or up to 10 Size 4 items for one year.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Power Generator (TL-7)
description: Low-tech power plant with a 1-day internal fuel supply. Powers one Size 5 item, or two Size 4 items, or four Size 3 items.  TL 7 and below have few or no digital elements, and produce tainted air as a by-product.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Power Generator (TL-8)
description: Low-tech power plant with a 1-day internal fuel supply. Powers one Size 5 item, or two Size 4 items, or four Size 3 items.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Power Generator (TL-9)
description: Low-tech power plant with a 1-day internal fuel supply. Powers one Size 5 item, or two Size 4 items, or four Size 3 items. Digital control panel and uses superior engineered fuels that produce less air pollution.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: #0 Power Cell
description: <!-- Summary Start -->The #0 Power Cell is a 5mm pellet that can power a Size 1 device.<!-- Summary End --> The PowerCell is a storage battery for operating devices independently. Typyically, a PowerCell is one size smaller than the device it powers, lasts for 24 hours (or about-a-day) of continual use, and has negligible discharge during non-use. Cells support micro-induction power transfer, and are capable of powering items without direct connections. The quality of the cell deteremines its operational life.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
